repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: National Archives and Records Service Copies of Federal Documentation on Black Workers

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: United States. National Archives and Records Service

did.abstract: Facsimile documents gathered by Professor James Gross and Cletus Daniels for their research project on black workers.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Contains employment situation surveys; migration survays; labor market development reports; labor market situation surveys; selective service system reports; field operating reports; labor demand-supply summaries; labor market surveys and other miscellaneous documentation regarding black workers for the period 1941-1948

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: National Archives and Records Service Copies of Federal Documentation on Black Workers #5584 A. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 5584: National Archives and Records Service Copies of Federal Documentation on Black Workers 5584 mf: National Archives and Records Service Copies of Federal Documentation on Black Workers on Microfilm
